overview: A resident of the Vyatka village of Bezdenezhnye, a pensioner Viktor Odintsov, dreamed of the starry sky from an early age. But he was able to take up astronomy and build three observatories on his estate only now, after completing his service in military aviation. And everything would be fine, but his dearest wife is constantly trying to pull her "astronomer" from the starry heights to the sinful earth. But the wife of his countryman and namesake dentist Alexander Odintsovo does not just support her husband's passion for paragliding, she herself loves to fly with him as a passenger.
title: Night Walks Along the Star Lanes
